name: AloneEscape 2
description:
AloneEscape 2

A short escape game with 2 endings. This game has point and click segments.

STORY

While skydiving, Dexter accidently fell inside an old house. Luckily he survived the fall but now the problem is to get out of the old house.

CREDITS

All things were made by me. Software used can be seen in more information part.

IF YOU HAVE ANY SUGGESTIONS TO IMPROVE THE GAME OR YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM PLS LET ME KNOW IN THE COMMENTS ;)
